amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike a provision in the bill that applies to any policy riders included in the annual Labor, Health and Human Services and Agricultural appropriations bills, to the new National Institutes of Health funds, and the Federal Drug Administration funds included in H.R. 6, the 21st Century Cures Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-193 to strike the provision that applies any policy riders included in the annual LHHS Appropriations Bill to NIH funds in H.R. 6. Also strikes the provision that applies any policy riders applied to the FDA in the annual Agriculture Appropriations bill to FDA funding in H.R. 6.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 245 (Roll no. 432).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 245 (Roll no. 432).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lee.
